com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Interface IDataCondition<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>,QUERY extends IDataQuery<DESC,DATA>,QUERYRESULT extends IQueryResult<DESC,DATA>>

  • Type Parameters:
    DESC -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBeanCondition, ITupleCondition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanExpressionCondition, AbstractDataCondition, BeanExpressionCondition, JEXLBeanCondition

    public interface IDataCondition<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>,QUERY extends IDataQuery<DESC,DATA>,QUERYRESULT extends IQueryResult<DESC,DATA>>
    This is a condition that evaluated local to where the condition is defined. A condition may be either pairwise or aggregate as determined by the results of isAggregate(). A pairwise condition is only provided remote data from a single peer at a time and an aggregate condition is provided all data from all peers specified in the subscription.

    A condition, implies a query that will acquire the data needed to evaluate the condition. The implied query is evaluated both locally and on the peer platforms. The peer platforms are also implied by the condition.

    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QUERY getQuery()
      Get a query that can be applied to the platform's storage to acquire the data that is required to evaluate the condition.
      boolean isAggregate()
      Return true if this condition is a condition across results from multiple peers.
      boolean isSatisfied(java.util.List<DATA> localData, java.util.List<QUERYRESULT> remoteData)
      Apply a test on the given collection of application data to determine if the corresponding action should be called.

    • Method Detail

      • isSatisfied

        boolean isSatisfied(java.util.List<DATA> localData,
                  java.util.List<QUERYRESULT> remoteData)
        Apply a test on the given collection of application data to determine if the corresponding action should be called.
        Parameters:
        localData - the data from the local platform
        remoteData - results of query from the remote node.
        userData - optional data that was provided to the the subscription request.
        Returns:

      • isAggregate

        boolean isAggregate()
        Return true if this condition is a condition across results from multiple peers. Otherwise it is a pair-wise condition between the local data and the data from a single remote peer. If the condition is used with a subscription to multiple peers and is not aggregate, then the condition will be fired for each separate peer as their data arrives.
        Returns:

      • getQuery

        QUERY getQuery()
        Get a query that can be applied to the platform's storage to acquire the data that is required to evaluate the condition. The query will be used for both local and remote data.
        Returns:
        null if no query, and thus local or remote data, is required to evaluate the condition.
